'So, in the end, what did Sara say?'%K%P
'She said that she'd decided to retire a long\ntime ago. That was actually how the whole plan\nfor the audition started.'%K%P
Sara hadn't told Shuri the real truth.%K%P

That was probably best.
If she'd told Shuri that she couldn't sing any more,
Shuri likely wouldn't have been able to focus
on the audition.%K%P
'But she should have told us!\nShe can be so distant sometimes.'%K%P
'I understand how you feel, but I bet\nshe couldn't have told us, even if she wanted.\nI mean, they've got NDAs and all that stuff.'%K%P
'Ohhh, I see...'%K%P
For the time being, it looked like they both\naccepted the situation.%K%P
'Okay you two, let's get focused\non the final audition.'%K%P
Since we'd gotten past the Sara situation,\nit was time to face the final audition.%K%P
The audition was in a month,\nand we were meeting to plan out how to handle it.%K%P
'I guess it's time to break up the group, isn't it?'%K%P
'Nooo! I don't want to do that!'%K%P
'But now we're in direct competition, aren't we?\nI mean, in the end there can be only one, right?'%K%P
'Yeah, but... I like performing with you, Shuri...'%K%P
'Oh, that's so sweet of you...\nI mean, I want to stay in Love☆Kami, too...'%K%P
'But we can't. We have to be serious about this.'%K%P
'There's no need to break it off\nfor good or anything. Once the audition's over,\nyou can get back together.'%K%P
'Yamato's right.\nSo Love☆Kami is just going on a temporary hiatus.'%K%P
'Well, if that's the case,\nI guess I can handle it...'%K%P
It looked like Kagura more or less agreed,\nso I thought the problem had been solved.%K%P
'But, what are you going to do after this, Yamato?'%K%P
If the two of them were going forward on their own,\nmy role would become kind of complicated.%K%P
'Well, if it's possible,\nI'd like to keep working with him...'%K%P
'Me too. I have no idea what to do on my own!'%K%P
They had both been on their own,\nand experienced the struggle.%K%P
To suddenly go back to that after being\npart of a trio like this must have been scary.%K%P
'I still think the three of us should stay together!'%K%P
'But then nothing will change, will it?'%K%P
The audition would put them into direct competition,\nso the three of us continuing like we always had\njust would not work.%K%P
I was sure Kagura understood it in her head,\nher heart just hadn't caught up.%K%P
'Okay then, how about alternating days?'%K%P
'But then we'll know exactly what the other's doing.'%K%P
'I'm okay with that.\nI don't have anything to hide from you.'%K%P
'Maybe you're okay with it, but I'm not!'%K%P
It looked like Shuri had some kind of plan.%K%P
Whatever the case, it would be important to\nkeep their ideas secret from each other.%K%P
'And anyway, I want to compete\nhead to head with you, Kagura.'%K%P
'Ever since we formed our duo,\nI always thought you were so amazing.\nYou have so much more appeal than I do.'%K%P
'Oh, but... Shuri, you're amazing too!\nYou're a great singer, and you're so smart.'%K%P
'But you're so much better at dancing.\nAnd you're so likable,\nthat's a really strong point...'%K%P
'With all of that, I think you make\na really worthy opponent.'%K%P
'And so this time, I want to step back and\ngive everything I've got to compete with you.'%K%P
It was precisely because they had become so close\nthat she wanted to have a real competition.%K%P
Shuri's passionate words seemed to\nlight a fire in Kagura, as well.%K%P
'All right, Shuri, it's on!'%K%P
'I'm counting on you.\nShow me what you're made of!'%K%P
Shuri and Kagura were already throwing off sparks.%K%P
It looked like I could relax a bit.%K%P
'Well then, I guess I'll step back and\nwatch from a distance.'%K%P
'If I helped either one of you,\nit wouldn't be a fair fight, would it?'%K%P
'I guess you're right...'%K%P
'But... Are you okay with that, Yamato?\nLove☆Kami isn't just the two of us, it's a trio.'%K%P
'Well, I appreciate you saying that,\nbut in the end I'm just your support.%K%P
If you two are really going head-to-head,\nI think it's fine if I bow out for a while.'%K%P
'Yamato has said what he wants.\nListen to him.'%K%P
'Right... I understand.'%K%P
I would be lying if I said it didn't feel lonely.%K%P
All three of us had worked so hard,\nbut at the end of it all,\nI would be the only one to leave.%K%P
I had this feeling of emptiness,\nlike I didn't know why I'd done it all.%K%P
When I thought about it more,\nof course, it hadn't been for me, but for these two.%K%P
And so for their sakes, I would stay out of\nthe final auditions.%K%P
Nothing would actually change for me.\nMy position was still exactly the same.%K%P
That was what was best for Love☆Kami.%K%P
